org.ros.actionlib.client
Class CommStateMachine<T_ACTION_FEEDBACK extends Message,T_ACTION_GOAL extends Message,T_ACTION_RESULT extends Message,T_FEEDBACK extends Message,T_GOAL extends Message,T_RESULT extends Message>

java.lang.Object
  org.ros.actionlib.client.CommStateMachine<T_ACTION_FEEDBACK,T_ACTION_GOAL,T_ACTION_RESULT,T_FEEDBACK,T_GOAL,T_RESULT>
Type Parameters:
T_ACTION_FEEDBACK - action feedback message
T_ACTION_GOAL - action goal message
T_ACTION_RESULT - action result message
T_FEEDBACK - feedback message
T_GOAL - goal message
T_RESULT - result message
public class CommStateMachine<T_ACTION_FEEDBACK extends Message,T_ACTION_GOAL extends Message,T_ACTION_RESULT extends Message,T_FEEDBACK extends Message,T_GOAL extends Message,T_RESULT extends Message>
extends java.lang.Object

A CommStateMachine monitors the communication between an action client and an action server and stores the state of progress of a goal. CommStateMachines get used by ClientGoalHandles.

Constructor Detail

CommStateMachine

public CommStateMachine(T_ACTION_GOAL actionGoal,
                        ActionClientCallbacks<T_ACTION_FEEDBACK,T_ACTION_GOAL,T_ACTION_RESULT,T_FEEDBACK,T_GOAL,T_RESULT> callbacks,
                        ActionSpec<?,T_ACTION_FEEDBACK,T_ACTION_GOAL,T_ACTION_RESULT,T_FEEDBACK,T_GOAL,T_RESULT> spec,
                        ActionClient<T_ACTION_FEEDBACK,T_ACTION_GOAL,T_ACTION_RESULT,T_FEEDBACK,T_GOAL,T_RESULT> actionClient)
                 throws RosException
Constructor used to create a CommStateMachine, which gets linked to the given action goal message and action specification. The ActionClientCallbacks parameter defines the callback methods to call, when transitions of the CommStateMachine's state occur or feedback messages are processed. If no callbacks shall be called the parameter may be set to NULL.

Parameters:
actionGoal - The action goal message this CommStateMachine shall monitor.
callbacks - The callbacks to call on state transitions or processed feedback messages
spec - The action specification
Throws:
RosException

findGoalStatus

protected org.ros.message.actionlib_msgs.GoalStatus findGoalStatus(java.util.ArrayList<org.ros.message.actionlib_msgs.GoalStatus> listStatus)
Searches in a list of GoalStatus messages for a specific GoalStatus, whose GoalID matches the GoalID of this CommStateMachine's action goal.

Parameters:
listStatus - list of GoalStatus messages
Returns:
The GoalStatus message. If no matching GoalStatus message could be found, NULL is returned.

updateFeedback

public void updateFeedback(T_ACTION_FEEDBACK actionFeedback,
                           ClientGoalHandle<T_ACTION_FEEDBACK,T_ACTION_GOAL,T_ACTION_RESULT,T_FEEDBACK,T_GOAL,T_RESULT> gh)
                    throws RosException
Extracts feedback messages from received action feedback messages and calls the action client's callback method for every feedback message processed. If the action feedback message's GoalID does not match the GoalID of this CommStateMachine's action goal, this method does nothing.

Parameters:
actionFeedback - The action feedback message
gh - The GoalHandle associated with the goal on which the action feedback message is received
Throws:
RosException

updateResult

public void updateResult(T_ACTION_RESULT actionResult,
                         ClientGoalHandle<T_ACTION_FEEDBACK,T_ACTION_GOAL,T_ACTION_RESULT,T_FEEDBACK,T_GOAL,T_RESULT> gh)
                  throws RosException
Extracts and stores the GoalStatus and result messages from the action result message. It updates the current state of this CommStateMachine to 'DONE' and calls the updateStatus(GoalStatusArray, ClientGoalHandle) method using the extracted GoalStatus message. If the GoalID of the action result message's GoalStatus does not match the GoalID of this CommStateMachine's action goal, this method does nothing.

Parameters:
actionResult - The action result message
gh - The GoalHandle associated with the goal on which the action result message is received
Throws:
RosException

updateStatus

public void updateStatus(org.ros.message.actionlib_msgs.GoalStatusArray gsa,
                         ClientGoalHandle<T_ACTION_FEEDBACK,T_ACTION_GOAL,T_ACTION_RESULT,T_FEEDBACK,T_GOAL,T_RESULT> gh)
                  throws RosException
Uses the findGoalStatus(ArrayList) method to get the right GoalStatus message from the given list of GoalStatus messages. Based on this GoalStatus the CommStateMachine may transition to a new state using the #transitionToState(ros.actionlib.state.CommState.StateEnum, ClientGoalHandle) method. If no matching GoalStatus could be found, this method does nothing.

Parameters:
gsa - An array of GoalStatus messages
gh - The GoalHandle associated with the goal on which the GoalStatus messages are received
Throws:
RosException

transitionToState

public void transitionToState(CommState.StateEnum state,
                              ClientGoalHandle<T_ACTION_FEEDBACK,T_ACTION_GOAL,T_ACTION_RESULT,T_FEEDBACK,T_GOAL,T_RESULT> gh)
                       throws RosException
Transitions the CommStateMachine to the given state. If an ActionClientCallbacks object is registered with this CommStateMachine, the corresponding callback method gets called on every transition.

Parameters:
state - The new state
gh - The GoalHandle associated with the goal this CommStateMachine is monitoring
Throws:
RosException
